channel.title: OSINT :: HackForge
channel.description: Search Engines & Advanced Queries Google Dorking Search within a specific site site:$ip Find open directories intitle:"index of" Find open directories intitle:"index of" Search for specific file types filetype:pdf Find admin panels inurl:admin View cached pages cache:$ip Search for emails "$user@gmail.com" Alternative Search Engines DuckDuckGo – Privacy-focused search Bing/Yandex – Different indexing results Shodan – IoT & network scanning Social Media OSINT User Enumeration Facebook:
